name: A Different 2D Platformer
description:
You are a "stick man"™ who must go through a bunch of levels with portals and Super Duper Mean Monsters, because...honestly why not?

You can shoot both ways...pretty neat-o, am I right?

You can move left, AND RIGHT!!!(#woah#craZ#wtf)

BUT THAT'S NOT ALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

There  👏 are 👏 also 👏 S C O R E S ! ! ! ! ! (u gotta unlock em tho)

Not to mention the ABSOLUTELY BREATHTAKING(!!!) Unoriginal Soundtrack

Did We mention there's a grand total of 1 Boss Battles(for now)?

More coming Soon

Don't forget to like and SUBSCRIBE and follow me on Google Play

Thanks for watching 😘
